title: Viral metagenomic analysis reveals diverse viruses and a novel bocaparvovirus in the enteric virome of snow leopard (Panthera uncia)
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Kingsley Ikechukwu Chukwudozie, Haoning Wang, Xiaolong Wang, Chunying Lu, Jiaxin Xue, Wen Zhang, Tongling Shan
